summary.commentary_synthesized: SILIGURI: CTC - Fair demand. Prices irregular following quality. [Source: Contemporary]

forecast_analysis.analysis: Demand is only 'Fair' and prices are 'Irregular'. While the YoY average is up significantly (+INR 34.36), the current high crop volumes ('Above Normal' in Dooars) may temper immediate price gains, leading to continued volatility based on quality.

weather_analysis.conditions: Favourable weather conditions. Crop: Above Normal.
